content: Section "11. Type safety and strict evaluation" of http://hl7.org/fhirpath/2018May/index.html mentions resolve(), but that is not defined on the page. I think the FHIR-specific functions were moved elsewhere. It would be nice if there were a link to that "elsewhere".
This is the R4 ballot version of the page: http://hl7.org/fhir/2018Sep/fhirpath.html
The spec will need a permalink there, I've noted this.
Thanks. I missed the signup period for the FHIRPath (and most other) ballots, so I can't comment on them myself. I still only partly understand FHIRPath, so that is probably not a bad thing.
